quirks.description: Greenhouse uses ARIA combobox widgets for dropdowns instead of standard <select> elements.
quirks.workaround: Use click-snapshot-click pattern: 1) Click the combobox to open, 2) Take a page snapshot to find options, 3) Click the matching option.

quirks.description: Form has invisible reCAPTCHA Enterprise that triggers on submit.
quirks.workaround: Prepare human-in-the-loop fallback for CAPTCHA challenges.

quirks.description: Resume upload uses a hidden file input triggered by an 'Attach' button overlay.
